data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Gina and Frankie got married in a well-known church in the town they grew up in. The ____ was ____, ____ very ____ and ____. It ____ painted a pure ____, ____ there ____ beautiful ____ made ____ colored ____. Inside there were many special paintings.
data.partBlankContent: Gina and Frankie got married in a well-known church in the town they grew up in. The chu___ was sim___, b__ very ele____ and lov___. It w__ painted a pure wh___, a__ there we__ beautiful win____ made o_ colored gl___. Inside there were many special paintings.
data.fullContent: Gina and Frankie got married in a well-known church in the town they grew up in. The church was simple, but very elegant and lovely. It was painted a pure white, and there were beautiful windows made of colored glass. Inside there were many special paintings.
data.answer: 吉娜和弗兰基在他们长大的小镇的一个著名教堂结婚。这座教堂很简单，但非常优雅可爱。房子被漆成纯白色，还有漂亮的彩色玻璃窗户。里面有很多特别的画。
